sentences.en: Things such as nostril size vary with temperature and humidity in ways that suggest evolution is at work.
sentences.cn: 鼻孔大小等因素随着温度和湿度的变化而变化，这种事表明进化在起作用。

sentences.en: I find this one of the easiest way to control stress. Click on the link to learn how to practice alternate nostril breathing.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是控制压力最简单的方法之一。点击链接学习如何练习交替鼻孔呼吸。
